versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Compiles marketing materials into organized package

schema.prompt:
Compile and organize all marketing materials into a comprehensive package:

Slogans: {{input.slogans}}
Ad Copy: {{input.adCopy}}
Social Posts: {{input.socialPosts}}
Email Content: {{input.emailContent}}
Landing Page Content: {{input.landingPageContent}}
Brand Guidelines: {{input.brandGuidelines}}

Create organized marketing package:

1. Executive Summary:
   - Campaign overview
   - Key messaging themes
   - Target audience summary
   - Success metrics
   - Timeline overview

2. Brand Guidelines Compilation:
   - Voice and tone standards
   - Messaging hierarchy
   - Visual style notes
   - Do's and don'ts
   - Consistency checklist

3. Core Messaging Library:
   - Primary taglines
   - Value propositions
   - Elevator pitches
   - Key benefit statements
   - USP summaries

4. Content Asset Inventory:
   - Headlines collection
   - Body copy variations
   - Call-to-action library
   - Subject line bank
   - Social media captions

5. Channel-Specific Materials:
   - Website/Landing pages
   - Email campaigns
   - Social media content
   - Paid advertising
   - Print materials

6. Implementation Timeline:
   - Launch sequence
   - Content publishing schedule
   - Campaign milestones
   - Review checkpoints
   - Optimization windows

7. Usage Guidelines:
   - When to use each asset
   - Customization instructions
   - Approval workflows
   - Quality standards
   - Legal compliance

8. Performance Tracking:
   - Key metrics to monitor
   - A/B testing opportunities
   - Success benchmarks
   - Reporting templates
   - Optimization triggers

9. Asset Organization:
   - File naming conventions
   - Version control system
   - Access permissions
   - Storage recommendations
   - Backup procedures

10. Next Steps Guide:
    - Immediate actions
    - Setup requirements
    - Team assignments
    - Resource allocation
    - Success measurements

Return as structured JSON with keys: marketingPackage (comprehensive organized content), implementationGuide (step-by-step instructions), assetInventory (categorized materials), brandingGuidelines (consolidated standards), performanceFramework (tracking setup), nextSteps (action items).

translations.description: Compiles all marketing materials into an organized, actionable package
translations.instructions: Enter all your generated marketing materials. The system will organize them into a comprehensive package with implementation guidelines.
translations.name: Marketing Materials Compiler
